name: SmartHomeG4Control
0:
”alexa, turn on light.”
”alexa, turn off light.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Use Alexa to control G4 devices. Before voice control, you need register an account in our website. Then set RSIP Mac Address and Device Data in the website. Last enable the skill, complete account linking and discorvery devices in alexa app.
